verbs.description: Trump [V: was] referring to the 1812 war , in which the U.S. and Britain fought partially over a trade dispute .
[ARG0: Trump] was [V: referring] [ARG1: to the 1812 war , in which the U.S. and Britain fought partially over a trade dispute] .
Trump was referring to [ARGM-LOC: the 1812 war] , [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG0: the U.S. and Britain] [V: fought] [ARGM-PRD: partially] [ARG1: over a trade dispute] .
